snippet.title: Chasing the Unseen - Official Demo Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description: Here's your look at Chasing the Unseen in this trailer for the upcoming game that draws inspiration from Journey and Shadow of the Colossus. In Chasing the Unseen, climb colossal creatures and explore fractal environments as you take the role of a young boy starting out his spiritual quest. A demo for Chasing the Unseen is coming to Steam.
